actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in social services funding for child care under that title, beginning with the fiscal year 1978, over and above the 8-percent increase in such funding which is presently provided under Public Law 94-401.

summary.text: Amends Title XX (Grants to States for Services) of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in social services funding for child care beginning with fiscal year 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to provide cost-of-living increases in social services funding for child care under that title, beginning with the fiscal year 1978, over and above the 8-percent increase in such funding which is presently provided under Public Law 94-401.
